note.p: Daughter of Joseph Edgar Boehm and his wife, Fanny Boteler. Married Randolph Albert Fitzhardinge Kingscote in 1890 (1867–1940, divorced 1902); married Captain James Douglas Anderson (1863/4–1944) in 1902.
BMD (Birth index, Marriage index, Death index)
Court for Divorce and Matrimonial Causes: divorce and matrimonial causes files (The National Archives J 77/742/2556)
